snippet.title: MAGIN: The Rat Project Stories - KICKSTARTER Trailer (ENG)
snippet.description:
WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We're proud to announce, that our three years long journey just reached a breaking point :)

OUR DEMO IS AVAILABLE ON STEAM!!!!!!!!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1205270/Magin_The_Rat_Project_Stories/

Our intention is to make the full game, but we'll need funds to do so.

WE JUST LAUNCHED CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN ON KICKSTARTER
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/471857358/magin-narrative-driven-deck-building-adventure-rpg/

Every pledge is important to us - indie developers.
Thanks to your support we were able to get our demo done.
Now it's time for the full game! :D
